name: DivaDiv
description:
The game is essentially a collection of mini-games which are triggered by interacting with the different characters. Each mini-game is based on a certain memory related to that character.

How to Play

Move with the WASD or arrow keys and press Space to interact with a character. Once you interact you can progress the dialogue by pressing Z until you start the game.

Nawaf's Game: A typical stack it game where you click on the screen to drop the box.

Rihal's Game: A game similar to aim trainers where you have to point and click on as many targets possible in the given time.

Hriday's Game: Very similar to FNF where you have to hit the correct arrow key when it reaches the white line.

Adi's Game: Avoid the obstacles by moving up and down to survive for as long as possible.

Steve's Game: A classic retro style game inspired by Frogger.
